title: Teeth Whitening
summary: Safe and effective teeth whitening for a brighter smile.
description: Our professional teeth whitening treatment removes years of stains caused by coffee, tea, wine, and smoking. The procedure is quick, painless, and can brighten your teeth by several shades in just one visit.

title: Root Canal Treatment
summary: Save your natural tooth and relieve dental pain.
description: A root canal is needed when the pulp inside your tooth becomes infected. Our expert endodontists perform root canals using modern tools and pain management techniques to ensure a stress-free experience.
precautions: Avoid chewing on the treated tooth until fully restored

title: Dental Implants
summary: Permanent solution for missing teeth with natural look.
description: Dental implants are artificial tooth roots made of titanium that are surgically placed into the jawbone. They offer a permanent, durable, and natural-looking solution to tooth loss.
precautions: Avoid smoking to ensure proper healing
